radiographic_examinations.findings: No pleural effusion or pneumothorax; normal heart size; cholelithiasis without cholecystitis; no intrahepatic biliary ductal dilation; normal spleen, pancreas and adrenal glands; kidneys enhancing symmetrically; focus of stranding and bowel wall thickening within the sigmoid colon, consistent with diverticulitis; no extraluminal air or adjacent fluid collection; normal appendix; patent portal vein, splenic vein and superior mesenteric vein; unremarkable bladder, rectum; 5.6 cm simple appearing cyst within the right adnexa; small follicular cyst in the left ovary; no concerning lytic or blastic osseous lesions.
